Fox News host Bill O: Reilly used the statistic to argue that certain Central American immigrants are a burden on the country.
The statistic was based on Census Bureau: which counted various welfare programs that immigrants from El Salvador, Guatemala, and Honduras may use.
The fact sheet cited by the expert state: of households headed by immigrants from El Salvador, 54% from Honduras, and 49% from Guatemala use at least one major welfare program.
The fact sheet did not differentiate bet: nor did O'Reilly in his statement.
